mapper.select: SELECT X.*, ROWNUM AS RANK FROM (select od.fin_prd_cd_code, f.fin_prd_cd_name, sum(od.sls_out_dtl_vol) as sls_out_dtl_vol from bf_sales_out_hd oh join bf_sales_out_dtl od on oh.sls_out_hd_no = od.sls_out_hd_no left outer join bf_cmn_finish_product_code f on f.fin_prd_cd_code = od.fin_prd_cd_code WHERE oh.SLS_OUT_HD_DATE BETWEEN SYSDATE-13 AND SYSDATE group by od.fin_prd_cd_code, f.fin_prd_cd_name order by sls_out_dtl_vol desc) X
